name: SUV Dungeon
description:
Traverse all 8 rooms of the Lich King's fortress in your roomy, powerful SUV.

How to Play
  • Click on tiles with arrows to move the SUV in a straight line to that tile
  • Click the furthest tiles away to accelerate, click the closest tiles to slow down
  • Attack enemies and pick up items by moving through the tile they're on
  • Break all the crystals in the room to unseal the door to the next room
  • If you are going to crash, the SUV's crash prevention system will activate and stop you. This will decrease your speed to zero and damage the SUV
  • The large dial at the top left is your speed
  • The linear gauge below the speedometer is your health
  • Find wrenches to increase your health
  • Find cash bundles to increase your score
Credits

Art and code by never_k

Music and sound effects by Bruno Almeida

Additional sound effects from the "Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection", by SubspaceAudio (Juhani Junkala), and from Super Mario World, by Nintendo.
